/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, mostly in shades of beige and brown, are punctuated by occasional red and green accents, adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
